item.title: CHEM 268/368, MENG 255/355, Spring 2024
item.description: Course Syllabus: here Lectures: T, TH 11:00 am - 12:20 pm Room: Kent 101 Office Hours Time Location Matthew Hennefarth TH, 12:30 pm - 1:30 pm Searle 105 Also by appointment Bhavnesh Jangid M, 2:00 pm - 3:00 pm Searle 105 Jiawei Zhan T/TH, 4:00 pm - 5:00 pm ERC 351 Jacob Wardzala W, 2:00 pm - 3:00 pm Searle 105 Lecture Notes March 19, 2024: Approximate Solutions March 21, 2024: Many-Particle Wave Functions March 26, 2024: Identical Particles May 2, 2024: Geometry Optimizations and IR Spectra May 7, 2024: Many-Body Perturbation Theory May 9, 2024: Molecular Properties May 14, 2024: Dipole Moments and Nuclear Gradients Assignments Homework Homework 1, Due March 28 on Canvas Homework 2, Due April 4 on Canvas Homework 3, Due April 13 on Canvas Homework 4, Due May 9 on Canvas Midterm The midterm is schedules for Thursday, April 18 from 11:00 am to 12:20 pm (during class time).
